basics.name: Vo Van Duc
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Developed and delivered high-end website solutions to a diverse client base by utilizing wide-ranging technologies and frameworks.

work.summary: Developing CI/CD roadmap and implementing to the project
highlights: Ansible: developing build and deployment scripts (php,mysql,nginx) to multi server (sandbox, production)
Testing my Ansible roles with Vagrant
Build (install dependency) and test application automatically when developers push code changes every day

work.summary: Cloud Computing: Company providing server infrastructure and cloud computing solutions
highlights: Develop and improve integrations with CRMmini internal
Design and develop page customer portal system to help customers manage their account
Create, maintains and enhances existing custom API for provider cloud (Onapp, Virtuozzo, Plesk)
To support development manager in solution delivery and implementation

work.summary: Project Order Product from Amazon.com: Customers in my country can buy products from Amazon.com Take a leading role in all stages of the software development lifecycle including requirements development, UI and database schema design, programming, system and user acceptance testing
highlights: ########## How to Scrape Amazon.com
Build an Amazon scraper for extracting product details and pricing when customer request (curl)
Scraping essentially means that script will download the web page from Amazon, parse the HTML and extract the price
Avoiding Bot Detection, Use a Proxy Service
########## Order System Admin
Module manage customer, order, invoice, product
Role manage for each module
Data visualizations, ad-hoc reports, database extracts, as well as Data visualizations, ad-hoc reports, database extracts, as well as
Multi website for each brand name
########## Customer Portal
Customer can access wesite, research product, add to cart and payment
Manage invoice, check status order

work.summary: Project Website Builder: The platform that gives customer the freedom to pick a template and customize theme. Start customer own blog, add an online store. Customers must purchase premium packages in order to connect their sites to their customer domains, theme pro, add e-commerce capabilities, or buy extra data storage and bandwidth
highlights: Develop and deploy new features to existing products
Write documentation to describe application development logic and coding
Collaborate with sales teams to understand customer requirements and provide sales support
Maintaining websites for clients
Multi-DB (one system database and separated tenant databases, table prefixed in the system database)
Multi-Channel (theme, subdomain for each tenant)

education.institution: NIIT Edufirst Centre, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
